contextId.occurrenceNote: Nahum speaks to the people of Nineveh. He tells them to prepare for battle, although he knows that the enemy will destroy the city. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-irony]])
contextId.glQuote: Man the city walls, guard the roads, make yourselves strong, assemble your armies

contextId.occurrenceNote: Nahum speaks to the people of Nineveh. He tells them to prepare for battle and to repair the walls, although he knows that the enemy will destroy the city. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-irony]])
contextId.glQuote: Go draw water for the siege ... pick up the molds for the bricks
